trans-unit.source: (The file external-link.png is also distributed with this plugin. Just copy it to the appropriate place in your website source tree, for instance in theme/static/images/.)
trans-unit.target: (The file external-link.png is also distributed with this plugin. Just copy it to the appropriate place in your website source tree, for instance in theme/static/images/ .)

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgments
trans-unit.target: 鸣谢

trans-unit.source: Allows the setting of the class attribute of `<a>` elements according to whether the link is external or internal to the Pelican-generated site.
trans-unit.target: Allows the setting of the class attribute of `` elements according to whether the link is external or internal to the Pelican-generated site.

trans-unit.source: Author
trans-unit.target: 撰稿人

trans-unit.source: Copyright (C) 2015, 2017, 2019 Rafael Laboissiere (rafael@laboissiere.net)
trans-unit.target: Copyright (C) 2015, 2017, 2019 Rafael Laboissiere (rafael@laboissiere.net)

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: For now, this plugin only works with Markdown. It was tested with version 3.0.1 of the Python Markdown module. It may not work with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 目前,这个插件只适用于Markdown。它是在Python Markdown模块的3.0.1版本中测试的。它可能无法与以前的版本一起工作。

trans-unit.source: If the default values of the configuration variables are used, then a possible CSS setting would be:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用配置变量的默认值,那么可能的CSS设置将是。

trans-unit.source: In order to avoid clashes with already-defined classes in the user CSS style sheets, it is possible to specify the name of the classes that will be used. They can be specified in the Pelican setting files with the LINKCLASS variable, which must be defined as a list of tuples, like this:
trans-unit.target: In order to avoid clashes with already-defined classes in the user CSS style sheets, it is possible to specify the name of the classes that will be used. They can be specified in the Pelican setting files with the LINKCLASS variable, which must be defined as a list of tuples, like this:

trans-unit.source: Link Class for Pelican
trans-unit.target: 鹈鹕的链接类

trans-unit.target: Many thanks to Yuliya Bagriy for setting up the package for PyPI and Lucas Cimon for fixing the issues with pytest and the smooth integration into the Pelican repository as a sub-module.

trans-unit.source: One of the possible uses of this plugins is for styling. Suppose that we have the following in your article written with Markdown:
trans-unit.target: 这个插件可能的用途之一是用于样式设计。假设我们在你的文章中用Markdown写了以下内容。

trans-unit.source: Styling the hyperlinks
trans-unit.target: 超链接的样式

trans-unit.source: The default values for EXTERNAL_CLASS and INTERNAL_CLASS are, respectively, 'external' and 'internal'.
trans-unit.target: The default values for EXTERNAL_CLASS and INTERNAL_CLASS are, respectively, 'external' and 'internal' .

trans-unit.source: Then, the result will look like the following:
trans-unit.target: 然后,结果就会像下面这样。

trans-unit.source: This plugin allows the setting of the class attribute of <a> elements (generated in Markdown by [ext](link)) according to whether the link is external (i.e. starts with http:// or https://) or internal to the Pelican-generated site.
trans-unit.target: This plugin allows the setting of the class attribute of <a> elements (generated in Markdown by [ext](link) ) according to whether the link is external (i.e. starts with http:// or https:// ) or internal to the Pelican-generated site.
